messages.subject: Always Learning
messages.msgSnippet: I find it possible to live mindfully and in the present, and to also think about that which cannot be proven. I don t see pondering the imponderables as
messages.messageBody:
I find it possible to live mindfully and in

the present, and to also think about that which cannot be proven. I don't

see pondering the imponderables as letting wishfulness guide one's

decisions. But I'm also not out to convince anyone else that I have anything

all figured out. My path is mine alone, whether or not someone has joined me

before or not. Mary

I like this Mary... I think there is so much we don't know about what's
going on in the Universe that I'd rather keep an open mind to the
possibilities that are out there in all aspects of my life.... I live in the
present..

Dawn



********************

"The people who get on in this world are people who get up and look for the
circumstances they want, and, if they can't find them, make them." - George
Bernard Shaw

"The only time my education was interrupted was when I was in school" -
George Bernard Shaw
